title: crashing game
body:
recently, actually just a past few days, my computer was crashed really hard when running LOL, it was crashed a couple of times until the computer got frozen... the only button you can used at that time was the power button to forced it to be turned off. 
my laptop info:
core i7 5500U 2.4 ghz
amd r9 m375
intel graphic HD 5500
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq10
tried to do all the things in here, but it's not work
checked the fan, the temperature of cpu, average got 84 degree when running LOL.
please you guys help me to figure it out for me to solve this problem... thank you

replies.body: Thanks for trying all of those steps, though it sucks there's still an issue.  I'd like to help as well but could use more info.  For example, can you specify what you mean by crash exactly?  Are there any error messages or a bugsplat?  Where is the crash happening?  I'll be here, just let me know!
